abstract: Buzzd, a location-based city guide and social network, will offer its services through MetroPCS and plans custom versions for the iPhone and BlackBerry.
snippet: Buzzd, a location-based city guide and social network, will offer its services through MetroPCS and plans custom versions for the iPhone and BlackBerry.
lead_paragraph: Who says Apple and Android-powered devices have all the application fun?

headline.main: Buzzd Seeks to Guide You, Whatever Your Phone
